text: When I notice opportunities for passive income, I recognize them and choose to build systems and automate instead.
During moments when income depends on my daily effort, I notice it and choose to build automated systems instead.
When I feel the pull to work manually for income, I notice it and choose to build passive systems instead.
I let not being able to build passive systems prevent me from creating automated income and growing assets effectively.
When I notice myself building passive systems, I recognize it and choose to maintain those automated patterns.
I see when income needs automation, and I choose to build systems that grow independently instead.
When I feel the urge to keep working manually, I notice it and choose to build passive systems instead.
I let not identifying passive opportunities prevent me from building automated systems and growing assets effectively.
When I notice passive growth working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those automated patterns.
I recognize when income depends on effort, and I choose to build automated systems instead.
When I feel the pull to work for income daily, I notice it and choose to build passive systems instead.
I let problems from not building passive systems prevent me from creating automated income and growing assets.
When I notice automated income working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those passive growth patterns.
I see when passive growth is needed, and I choose to build systems that automate and grow independently instead.
When I feel the urge to keep income manual, I notice it and choose to build automated systems instead.
I let not being able to automate systems prevent me from building passive income and growing assets effectively.
When I notice myself maintaining passive growth, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when income needs automation, and I choose to build passive systems that grow independently instead.
When I feel the pull to work manually for income, I notice it and choose to build automated systems instead.
I let not identifying passive growth abilities prevent me from building automated systems and growing assets effectively.
